- label: "PR Size"
  message: "Large"
  color: "red"
  when: "$additions > 200"

- label: "PR Size small"
  message: "Small"
  color: "green"
  when: "$additions < 200"

- label: "Pull"
  message: "PR $prNumber"
  color: "blue"
  url: "https://github.com/unofficial-skills/alpha-video/pull/$prNumber"
